entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mont-Tremblant
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.3°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:44 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
